name: PIGBLUE
description:
STORY:
A stranger finds himself in a strange town. Both the man and the town have their shares of secrets. As the time passes, the man finds himself lost in the town and within himself. Help him out of the town...


PIGBLUE is a visual novel/text-based adventure game with a dark atmosphere.

Features:

- Lots of reading
- A mystery that unfolds as you progress in the game.
- Puzzles
- Dark Ambient Soundtracks
- Literature
